text: Ludovico Maria Enrico Einaudi (born 23 November 1955) is an Italian pianist and composer. He has made several original albums of piano music and has made the soundtracks for several films, including This is England, The Father and Nomadland. He now lives in Milan, Italy. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Italian pianists Category:20th-century Italian composers Category:People from Turin Category:21st-century Italian composers
title: Ludovico Einaudi
